tooltips.case_transform: Convert text between uppercase, lowercase, and other cases
tooltips.numeral: Convert between different numeral systems (binary, octal, decimal, hex)
tooltips.bitwise: Perform bitwise operations (AND, OR, XOR, NOT, shifts)
tooltips.enigma: Historical WWII encryption machine with rotors and plugboard
tooltips.caesar: Shift alphabet letters by a fixed number of positions
tooltips.affine: Linear substitution cipher using modular arithmetic
tooltips.rot13: Rotate letters by 13 positions (Caesar cipher variant)
tooltips.a1z26: Convert letters to numbers (A=1, B=2, ... Z=26)
tooltips.vigenere: Polyalphabetic substitution cipher using a keyword
tooltips.bacon: Binary encoding using two distinct letter forms
tooltips.substitution: Replace each letter with another letter
tooltips.rail_fence: Transposition cipher writing text in zigzag pattern
tooltips.polybius: Encode letters using a 5Ã—5 grid coordinate system
tooltips.tap_code: Prison communication cipher using taps for coordinates
tooltips.base32: Encode binary data using 32 ASCII characters
tooltips.base64: Encode binary data using 64 ASCII characters
tooltips.ascii85: Encode binary data in ASCII (more efficient than Base64)
tooltips.unicode: Convert text to/from Unicode code points
tooltips.punycode: Encode Unicode strings for domain names (IDN)
tooltips.bootstring: Encoding algorithm for representing Unicode with ASCII
tooltips.hash: Generate cryptographic hash values (MD5, SHA-256, etc.)
